p: Based on the date of onset, the first wave of H7N9 virus circulation occurred from 13 March to 30 June 2013. In the first wave, the first and last cases occurred on 13 March and 18 April 2013, respectively. The second wave occurred from 1 July 2013 to 30 June 2014, with the first and last cases occurring on 7 October 2013 and 3 June 2014, respectively. The third wave occurred from 1 July 2014 to 30 June 2015. In the third wave, the first and last cases occurred on 17 November 2014 and 28 May 2015, respectively. The fourth wave occurred from 1 July 2015 to 30 June 2016. In the fourth wave, the first and last cases occurred on 18 September 2015 and 24 June 2016, respectively. The fifth wave occurred from 1 July 2016 to 31 March 2017, with the first case occurring on 28 September 2016.
